summary: GAMESTOP WASN'T THE ONLY ONE. - Presenting the other traded asset that fueled the meme stock revolution of 2021. Gamestop was the first, but it wasn't the only meme stock that caused a frenzy amongst retails investors. KOSS, a music gadget company, played a pivotal role in grabbing the power for the institutions and distributing them to the smaller guys. And now, KOSS has arrived on Ethereum to a herald a different kind of movement.
